text:
Hi,

I'm facing problems with our proxy server due to an error on the apache.org site: you are using a X.509 certificate issued for openoffice.org and *.openoffice.org for your site ant.apache.org.

Because of this name mismatch our web proxy blocks your client's the connection attempt. 

Cheers,
Marco
creator: marco.tanner@gmail.com
bodewig@apache.org
text: When I visit https://ant.apache.org/ the certificate used has the serial number 58:60:4E:AD:AA:64:7B:37:7E:05:65:6C:02:D9:AD:99 issued for *.apache.org.
Never mind, this was a SNI problem on our side. (Some webservers hosting ant.apache.org use SNI while others do not, and this confused our web proxy.)"
creator: marco.tanner@gmail.com
